Storyline

Bloed, Zweet en Tranen (Blood, Sweat and Tears) is a story about the
life of Andre Hazes, a Dutch populair singer. This movie shows three 
crucial phases in the life of Hazes: his youth ('60's), his breakthrough
('80's) and the last year of his life (early '00).
